website_summaries.verdict: A fun and flashy accessory your party guests will love to wear.
pros: Includes 36 adorable animal face LED rings and 100 glow-in-the-dark stars
Jelly rings stretch to fit most fingers
Flashing light is bright and lasts for hours
Rings are still wearable even after the light burns out
cons: Rings have a strong smell, you may need to wipe them and air them out

customer_reviews.title: Money saving bundle
customer_reviews.text: I know bought this type for a dollar each before so I am glad I bought this for my son's bday party. They all light up, although some i had to adjust the button. It seema that from the shipping and how tight the box is some.buttons moved but they all works. Very stretchy, it fit my 4 yr but too big for my 2 yr old. We are having a neon lights party so this will be a great little gift 😀❤️
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: So Far
customer_reviews.text: I think they are too cute! they all work and that is a plus. Some of them were hard to turn on. We will distribute them this weekend. I want to see how long they last. I do not expect much bc kids will not turn them off to save energy. I am impressed with how so much excitement and flashiness can be packed into a small space for such a low price. I do recommend but I will update about both the longevity and kids initial reaction.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Omg these were purchased for my dtrs birthday and they are bright , some looked a little funny and please check each ring as I had 4 that the area were battery is at was broken so it inside components came out so just check them thoroughly. All in all great value and looks so cute when all the little turned them on and we’re running around in the dark
customer_reviews.author: r.stgo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: These are squishy rings shaped like cute animal faces with a push on/off LED light inside that flashes rainbow lights. We got them for gift bags for an end-of-year party at school and the kids all loved them. Out of the set of 36, only 1 didn't light up. It was actually a fun excuse to cut it open so the kids could see the mechanism inside. Ordering these off Amazon is also a better value than going to a party supply store, dollar store or big box retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great option for class party
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVED these. They are super cute, and very bright and flashy. The kids adored them in their end of the year gift for the summer. My daughter brought them to the fireworks in July, and just generally likes to play with them if we are out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Keen

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favors!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them! I only wish the blinking lights had an automatic turn off timer because you have to push them to turn them off....they will blink all day otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: apara

customer_reviews.title: Great for a birthday party
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and does not have that nasty rubber smell. I tested all of them, when they arrived, and they all worked. Good size, strong light, and look really cool in dark. Put them on your kids, you will spot them in dark, right away. haha...
customer_reviews.author: GreenTea

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters party goody bags. The variety allowed for us to give each child more than one glow toy and the kids had a blast with them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give this product 10stars !
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this product 10 stars ! Lights last for many days !!!! Grandkids went nuts over them !!
customer_reviews.author: F Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: These were all nice and bright when the kids put them on. The lights lasted and almost all of them were easy to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Larry & Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: OHEMGEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM! Way better than I expected and they all work! I tested each one! Soooo happy. Cute lil gifts for Burning Man :)
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product You get what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and colorful and so far have lasted for many hours. Great product, easy to use, and soft so no potential injuries for little toddlers who want to have fun. Awesome product (very impressive).
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and kids love them... and they even include glow in the dark stars for free...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👍 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Got these for 4th of July party for the kiddos and they loved them hot of the party.. Fast shipping too
customer_reviews.author: stormy

customer_reviews.title: STINKS like toxic waste
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. These things looked awesome and are indeed flashy, but smell like a toxic dump. Tried airing them out, soaking in a vinegar, etc. I wouldn’t put these near my kids if you paid me. Not sure where all the five star reviews are coming from. I’m okay with “cheap” products, but not ones that will nauseate everyone in 10’ radius.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended at all
customer_reviews.text: These rings are definitely not kids size and are poorly made. Majority of the pieces come over stretched and the head pieces are huge. Also the activators to turn on the lights are had to locate and frustrate kids attempting to come on. My set was immediately returned and we ordered a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: returned, strong smell did not go away.
customer_reviews.text: i let them outgas for 15 days, the smell did not go away. i have chemical sensitivities, and it was still overpowering after that time. we do a teal pumpkin halloween, i could not hand this out to kids with allergies. several were broken, i only had only about a third of them.
customer_reviews.author: TeaZillaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of Paint and Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: These came as expected and were an awesome addition to birthday goody bags, however once you opened the package to each one it smelled so strongly of paint. It actually made me sick. I had to take them away from my kids and am worried for all the others who took some home before I knew they smelled so strongly :(
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Strong formaldehyde smell
customer_reviews.text: The rings emit a very strong chemical odor - they smell like formaldehyde. My nose watered and throat got irritated after I smelled these. This is a huge disappointment because after seeing the great ratings and Amazon recommendation, I was planning to use these for a party favor bag for my 4-year-old's birthday. There is no way I will give these to kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute rings
customer_reviews.text: I write reviews on every product I purchase, but this one is a bit special. I purchased these for my 33 first grade students to include in their Christmas present. When it arrived, I only had 32. I was upset that one student would be left out and I didn’t have time to order another set. I emailed the company and told them what happened. They went above and beyond my expectations immediately sending more out so that I could give these to every student. Mistakes happen, but how they handled it, makes me a customer for life. I am so happy I bought these adorable little light up rings. My students are going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong Off gas/rubber odor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as piñata filler and to put in take home party bags. They are cute and all of them lit up when pressed. The problem was the smell. Even individually wrapped, with 10 days to air out they smell like an open can of rubber cement. I didn’t end up using them because it would be irresponsible to mix them with edible treats in the piñata or gift bags. I ordered several other rubber toys that were fine, but these just didn’t seem “safe” for a group of six year olds. Maybe in a few months the offgases will dissipate?!?! I gave them a couple stars because they are as described...
customer_reviews.author: Savvymomof5

customer_reviews.title: Great for handing out on Halloween
customer_reviews.text: These are REALLY cute, good for any season but I bought them to hand out on Halloween and I'll probably include the leftovers in Christmas stockings. Note that the lights are very very blinky, so blinky I blurted, epilepsy warning! when I turned one on. So, you know, epilepsy warning. But otherwise really cute. Get them out of the box so they can un-squish for a while cause they pack them in tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joolie

customer_reviews.title: Hold your nose!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved these and immediately put them in the gift bags. My daughter's asked if they could have one and i said yes. Holy chemical smell Batman. There is no way I can give these to children because the odor is absolutely horrendous. I am going to have to take them back out of the gift bags. Not to mention the 1st one we opened did not work.. Overall I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Smells toxic
customer_reviews.text: This product smells absolutely toxic and unsafe. My grandson was so looking forward to receiving these, and after opening the package myself, I was overwhelmed by the awful odor. It smells like turpentine. Or stronger. It's awful.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very cute prize rings
customer_reviews.text: Very cute jelly-like squishy rings. They light up just fine and you can press the button to turn them off. They will make fabulous prizes at school. The designs are super cute. However, they smell so bad! I had to unwrap each one and leave them in the office to air out, they have a very strong chemical smell. I think once they lose that smell, the kids will love them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute/Bright/Flashy/Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Cute but oh the smell! Eau de spray paint or something equally chemical ... Removed from their individual wrappings and put in a box outside, hopefully to be aired out by Halloween. Bonus: The lights are nearly migraine/seizure-inducing, they’re so bright and frenetic, but that’s to be expected of these flashing gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Your Friendly Online Neighbor

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves a flashing glow ring!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care if you are a kid or an adult, everyone loves a gummy ring that blinks on their hand. My wife and I hosted a 90's rave party, and gave these out to all the guests, and they were tickled pink. It automatically transports you to a simpler time. They are bright colorful and fun -- and they were still blinking for the next few days. Highly recommended for any occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: STINKY
customer_reviews.text: In the description, the seller does mention an odor & suggests airing them out. But let me tell you... It is SO bad and almost unbearable. It's not just a plastic/rubber smell, it is a chemical smell... Like turpentine. I've been airing them out, outside, for days and they still stink. I wanted to use these for a preschool party but there's no way I can give them to children while they smell that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Rings smell like formaldehyde.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these rings. They smell like formaldehyde. The smell was so strong when I first opened the packages that it burned my eyes and throat. I opened them all and tried to let them air out for a couple of days but the order was still strong enough to burn. I was going to use these as an alternative to giving out candy on Halloween, but, I'm afraid I would be poisoning the kids. Amazon, you shouldn't even be offering these rings for sale. They are not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Trinkle

customer_reviews.title: Bet adults will like them as much as kids!
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked these and am pleased. Yes, they do have an odd wet paint smell when you remove them from the individual wrapper but only noticable if you hold it up to your nose. All of them light up and are easy to turn off. Some faces are a little smooshed but all are cute! All in all, pretty happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun product for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter chose these for her Halloween goody bags at school. The kids loved them. They are good quality, last long (they can turn on and off) and you get several in a package. So, I didn't have to order two orders for her 28 child classroom. We are going to use the left over ones for birthday goody bags and New Years.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona1313

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Super Bright! Fun For Goodie Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome birthday goodie bag gift! My daughter also passed them out at school on her birthday to her classmates. For the price, it was a fun thing for her to hand out and the kids all loved them! They light up so nicely and are very bright. I was surprised at the quality. I would order them again. I may give them out at Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: JessJess

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween treat for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Halloween treats for the kids. Next year we will order two sets. You do have to press pretty hard to get them to come on, so leaving them in the individually packaged plastic wrap, we turned each one on. They lit up the treat bowl, and they were the first treats chosen by the kids. Even over the candy! Next year we will order two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Fritz

customer_reviews.title: toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: Are you seriously selling these for kids? They gave a toxic smell even before I opened the individual bags. They probably have separate bags because everything would stick to them and the paints would probably all get mixed from one another. Will definitely return them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Tirlea

customer_reviews.title: Lasted all night
customer_reviews.text: Placed these in a tray as prizes for our glow party. These were a big hit and lit up nicely. We lit up right before the party and they lasted all night. A couple were a little tricky to turn on as i imagine the piece inside shifted, but you just have to figure out where to squeeze and they turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicaanette

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kiddos. Unisex friendly
customer_reviews.text: I am making little goodie bags for my husbands family Christmas party for all the small kids. This is a very affordable large pack of led jelly rings. Easy to turn on and off! I realized they actually turned off after a few hours they still didn’t shut off till I pressed it again. 😂 anyways great for the kids and they will definitely love wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and long lasting lights
customer_reviews.text: That are very cute and were a hot in the favor bags at my daughter's birthday party. They do last a very long time as we had some left over and brought them home, her younger brother turned one on and left it in the toy box 2 days later i went in the toy box and it was still flashing..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting and Fits Everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun idea for kids parties (or Christmas Stocking Stuffers!) We added the light up rings to the pinata at our daughters party. They are stretchy and one size fits all. They come pre-installed with batteries and just a push-click of the ring, and it starts flashing different colors!
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: No power indicator
customer_reviews.text: There was no indicator of where the power switch was. You just had to keep pressing at random.
customer_reviews.author: L. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cute with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these for a non food option for kids on Halloween. They were super fun. Only cons: large ring finger hole (adult size not kid size), weird plasticy smell when opened. I opened every ring and let them air out before offering them to the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Was shorted two items and several were defective.
customer_reviews.text: Was shorted two rings. Only received 34 and at least 5 were defective. Horrible quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT RECEIVE 36 bummer :(
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to hand out in goodie bags to 34 kids... what a total bummer to count them and notice I had only received 32 now 2 kids will have to be w/o 😤 I paid for 36 not 32 I expect to get what I PAID FOR.. Total bummer but besides that they are cute. 2 kids will just have to get extra candy for not receiving their light up ring SMH
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Independent88

customer_reviews.title: Last long, fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: These toys are awesome, approximately $0.50 each. I used for birthday goody bag, cheap and very fun. The kids love them. The battery lasts pretty long, and it’s pretty durable too since there’s no moving parts, great for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween treat!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that I could give to all kids, even those with allergies. All the kids LOVED these, although I dec have to show some how to turn them on and off. What fun!
customer_reviews.author: life-long learner

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for parties!!!! My kids are in love with those things... not a single birthday party without a ring. It’s like a must! Lights last only for one night... does the job though. Buying again
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad, the plastic stinks, Besides that they work great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maddock

customer_reviews.title: Cute but some didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute but some don’t turn off. And others didn’t work at all. On the other hand the ones that didn’t turn off were still flashing days later. I guess that’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Pet817

customer_reviews.title: Great value and soooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a night caroling event at Christmas. They are so cute, soft and easy to turn on and off. Such a good deal for the price. The kids loved theme such a fun addition to have in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyes

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: These rings were loved at the birthday party. The kids wore them when it got dark and they are better than sparklers! Easy to wear, easy to turn on and off, just plain fun. A great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Trains

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my daughters class. All the kids loved them! We had some extras left over so we gave them to my neices and nephews. They were a big hit with them also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as party favors for my daughter's birthday and the children loved them! I was able to put a bunch in each bag since they give so many. Definitely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bromista Davis

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for class events. Some of them looked squished and the shape didn’t return. The face parts that were printed were off.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Blindingly bright
customer_reviews.text: Decided not to pass out to small children because of how bright and crazy the lighting was.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item Sent
customer_reviews.text: I got a totally different item inthe mail! I bought them to attach to Valentine's Cards for my students. There were supposed to be 36 pieces, the box sent only has 24. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler's Green INC

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well, but Strong Acetone Smell
customer_reviews.text: The rings looked good and seemed to work well, but there is an overwhelming smell of acetone on each ring. We decided to wipe each ring down before giving them as gifts to kids. However, the smell is still present.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Kirimis

customer_reviews.title: Very strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. Quality matches the price. They all light up but some of the paint was coming off on a few pieces. The chemical smell is really really strong when you open the box. It was a bit better after airing out outside all night. They were a hit with my kindergarteners classmates though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for a Halloween carnival. The kids loved them. Lots of fun. The batteries last a long time. Will order them again for next year. The miT sought after prize at the carnival.
customer_reviews.author: BILL B.

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: This rings are really cute and the battery life is decent. I wasn’t able to use them since they give off a strong toxic smells. I let them air out for a week before the party but the smell was just as strong. Quality wise they are great I just didn’t feel comfortable giving these to children because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Alvarado-Frame

customer_reviews.title: Organic solvent smell
customer_reviews.text: Strong organic solvent smell. I bought this product to prepare the gifts for my son’s classmates. My kids were so excited to open the box and play with the cute rings. They loved them. However we soon found this product having very strong distinct organic solvent smell! I’m sure no parent would like their kids to receive such gift.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: They are OK
customer_reviews.text: Half the box looked ok... The other half was missing an eye or half the design rubbed off. Kids enjoyed them but was hard to turn off and on. Once you got the light to turn on, it would never turn off on some of the designs.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece and she took them to school and apparently I started something because she asked if I could order more the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at a regional burn!
customer_reviews.text: I put a box of these at the "gifting tree" at a regional burn (festival) and they were gone very quickly. It was neat seeing people wearing them all around.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Every one worked. They are awesome. Turns on and off easily. I bought for my children but I enjoyed these myself. Long lasting. I bought for Christmas and my kids are still enjoying them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, kids love and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute. My students loved them. This product is good if you are on a budget. Lots of variety in the types of rings. Only con is some of them were a little difficult to press to get them to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dalesandry

customer_reviews.title: Mindful with maturity
customer_reviews.text: Good for older children. My 6 and 3 yrs old were able to take the top of the rings off with ease. We didn’t even know they could come apart in such a manner. Overall though the birthday girl whose turning 10 loves them and can’t wait to share with friends
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Best party favor at the birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Adorable !! Ordered these for my daughters birthday party — she is 6 !! These light up and are a huge hit !! There are a lot of them too and multiples of each animal so no one fights over one !!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Wieberg

customer_reviews.title: A quarter of my order was un-usable :(
customer_reviews.text: About a quarter of my order was un-usable. It was like some of the rubber got too hot a they were distorted and a few faces were rubbed off and/or placed sideways. And the distortion was on the finger ring part and you couldn't put on your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to count
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my purchase and the box was opened. I noticed they were cute and decided to counted my items. Box and description said 36 items but I and only received 33 rings. I just expected to have everything since I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun party favors for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as party favors for my nieces birthday party. What a hit! The kids loved them! Boys and girls ages 5-9 were having a great time with these! Had enough for everyone plus still have some for the next party.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and cool
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully. Kids loved them and it was for a 13th birthday glow party. They light up and some colors are iv reflective!! Boys and girls loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not all rings were animals and a lot of them weren’t working. I gave them to my students as a gift and well you can imagine the disappointment when they received one that didn’t light up.
customer_reviews.author: juliane

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: These came well packaged and they are just so cute, we used them for kids birthday party and kids loved them. some didnt turn on but most did
customer_reviews.author: Anned Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great for value, lights blink fast
customer_reviews.text: This was great for treat bags! The value is great, the kids were having a blast with them. The only thing was that the lights did blink incredibly fast, it got me a bit dizzy if I stared too much. It would’ve been perfect if it could have had just one setting instead of the flashes.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rings are awesome!!!! All the kids from my son's class love them so much, are very nice and bright at night, and fit all sizes, well since 5th grade kids to adults!!!
customer_reviews.author: zayra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a large variety of designs like the photo shows. The box showed all eyeball rings. Didn’t even open it and sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lawfer

customer_reviews.title: They smell like toxic chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Light up well and kids liked them....but are they toxic??
customer_reviews.author: Ibuytoo Much

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a party favor for my daughter’s 6th birthday. The kids loved them! Exactly what I hoped they be. Stretchy and soft little animals decorating the top of the ring were cute and the flashing LEDs inside were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Reel

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Fun stuff for kids . The only thing about this is they smell so strong, recommend open them up and wash them before hand them to the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ming S

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a birthday party and the kids loved them! They are cute and good price but some stop working right away.
customer_reviews.author: Violeta P.

customer_reviews.title: 19 of mine didn't light up
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved them unfortunately I had disappointed kids because 19 of the rings would not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: roses r red

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter to hand out with all her Valentines cards for her class. Everyone loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: michael juenemann

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kids
customer_reviews.text: Best light up ring I have purchased. These were bought for a fall festival as prizes and the kids loved them they stay lit for a long time before battery dies
customer_reviews.author: E.Artips

customer_reviews.title: Good and bright rings.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. One was correct with 36 pieces box, but the other was 24. Anyways, the rings are good and bright. Kids are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Lights on ring lasted several days...then I figured out you can turn on and off by pressing head. Cute. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable light up rings
customer_reviews.text: All my cuties at school loved these rings. I put them in goodie bags for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ohana Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good for party favors. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter wanted these for her birthday party favors. They are cute, durable, stretchy rings
customer_reviews.author: Terese G Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I hand them out as a surprise to little kids I see , of cause after I ask there parents. Makes me HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Judi K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with my purchase. I have put this in the goodie bags and all the kids were so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ridhima Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice party bag toys. Kids loved them! Nice & bright LED toy rings.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not all lit up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my students and passed them out. Very disappointed that 6 did not work! I had very sad kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Party
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the birthday party guest they were very cute kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun party favors
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun still lighting after 4 months. Gave out as party favors will buy again. Also did have a smell. Hung them on line and left them outside to air out for one day (paint thinner smell) smell completely went away. Good purchase all rings lit up. Maybe 3 were slightly squished and good not fix shape so well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Mikulala Birthday Party Favors for Kids Prizes Flashing 36 Pack LED Jelly Light Up Rings Toys Bulk Boys Girls Gift Blinky Glow in The Dark Party Supplies 9 Color 9 Shape
feature_bullets: 💥 Mikulala 36 Pack Party Favor Rings for Kids

💥【9 COLOR 9 SHAPE - CUTE ANIMAL PARTY FAVORS FOR KIDS ADULTS】Each party pack contains 36 light up rings. There are 9 colors of these jelly rings, such as yellow, Orange, pink, blue, green, red, white, ginger and purple. There are 9 different animal shapes of these glow rings for kids, such as bear, Tiger, rabbit, panda, pig, frog, chick, butterfly & heart. Please check the shapes in the showing pic. Great party gifts for kids.

💥【RLASTIC RUBBER MATERIAL - FIT FOR DIFFERENT SIZE OF GINGERS】These kids party favors using environmental quality TPR material, together with strengthen elasticity, strong stretching flexibility. Both kids and adults can wear these fun party favors rings. One package fit for everyone. Each flashing ring is individually wrapped. These glow in the dark party supplies are perfect for kids birthday party, glow party. All of the led rings for kids are bright enough to attract children's sights.

💥【EASY ON / OFF SWITCH】There are 2 batteries in each of these party supplies for kids. To activate the blinking rings, simply press on the button and it will start flashing. These bulk party favors for kids blink three colors flashes, blue, green & red, it’s very shiny. Press the button again, these kids birthday party favors rings will be turned off. It is very easy for kids to turn them on or off. These teen neon party favors are stretchy, feel like jelly, very comfortable touch.

💥【ADD JOYFUL TO YOUR PARTY】These party favors for girls boys are a combination of ring, led and animal shapes all of which are loved by kids. The kids will become the center of attention at the party with these glow party favors, it can also make your kids look distinctive and easily catch attention in the crowd. These boys girls party favors can be worn at any cheerful occasions, such as kids birthday party, LED party, glow party, weddings, Christmas, Halloween, or any other cheerful events.

💥【NONTOXIC GLOW TOYS】Safety is our top priority at Mikulala. We work hard to ensure all our light up toys meet the highest standards. We always keep an eye out for the latest and greatest glow in the dark items, and partner with the best glow manufacturers to put them in your hands. Our glow party supplies, glow LED toys and glow decorations are nontoxic and safe for ages 3+.
